title: Rebel Bitten
description: Once upon a time, humankind ruled the world while lycans and vampires lived in secret.This is no longer that time. WillowRun, run, run!They're chasing me, even into my dreams.And when I awake, I see him. Striking blue eyes with a hint of the devil inside. He's my savior and my worst nightmare combined.Because he owns me.He found me.He saved me.But I don't want to be owned. I want to be free. Even if it kills me.RyderI needed a diversion, a plaything, something to distract me from this perpetual boredom. And she appeared as if the Almighty above had heard my prayers.Or, more accurately, the devil.Because I'm not a good man. Humanity died inside me long ago. It was what I needed to survive.But she's such a pretty little thing. I think I'll keep her and make her mine. At least for a little while. Humans are so fragile, after all.Welcome to Ryder Region.It might not be mine yet, but it will be soon.For I haven't lived this long by playing nice.I prefer to bite.
author: Lexi C. Foss
